Looking for courseware or online homework tools to pair with our text?
Check out Tech Scout!

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
OpenStax knows that collaboration is key when it comes to improving teaching and learning, which is why we’ve partnered with 60+ education technology partners who’ve integrated our free content with their platforms. These platforms offer extra features to support teaching, ranging from online homework to autograding to labs and beyond!

Narrowing down which partners best meet your classroom needs may seem like a daunting task, but it doesn’t have to be with the OpenStax Tech Scout tool. With Tech Scout, you’re able to:

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Narrow down the tools you actually want and need for your subject based on 12+ filters, like LMS integration, cost, and online teaching features

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Read other instructors’ reviews for each product

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Request additional information directly from our partners

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Want to see what courseware, online homework, and other technologies are available for your subject? Take a look at Tech Scout today
